sense.name: time period
sense.commentary: A unit of time that lasts about thirty days. Not dependent on divisions in the calendar.
sense.examples: He was given one month to pay his bill. The prisoner spent two months in solitary confinement. A moment apart from you, my love, feels like months.

sense.name: calendar unit
sense.commentary: A division of the calendar. Often named. Not a definite unit of time: if today is October 30th, I can say the next month starts in two days.
sense.examples: My favorite month is June. John's thesis will be due next month. Tomorrow is the first of the month.
